job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., * Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI/UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Sr. Software Engineer

This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., * Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI/UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building AI-centric products, utilizing generative AI for products and productivity, and working with LLMs, RAG, and Agents. While it mentions full-stack development, the core focus is on integrating and developing applications around generative AI technologies, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features' indicates a need to comprehend business needs and translate them into technical guidance.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams' shows an understanding of how new features affect the broader business and technical landscape.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity' directly points to the use and application of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)' and 'Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents' are core components of generative AI modeling and application development.
job_tasks.phrase: LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models), Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept' suggests research and development in modeling and design.
job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

job_tasks.justification: The job title 'Full Stack Sr. Software Engineer' and phrases like 'collaborate to build new AI centric products' and 'design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems' clearly indicate software development responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Full Stack Sr. Software Engineer, collaborate to build new AI centric products, design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'APIs GraphQL, REST' and 'React UI/UX' are typical components of building user-facing software applications.

The phrase 'Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards' and 'Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams' are standard software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards, Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams

job_tasks.justification: The inclusion of 'Docker, Kubernetes' and 'Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI' points to the infrastructure and deployment aspects of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Docker, Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS' suggests experience with distributed systems and message queues, common in production environments.
